mWoGg8JJqgUUlOOvb.name: Diffuse
mWoGg8JJqgUUlOOvb.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mmZvPUnH763yu56go.name: Homogenous
mmZvPUnH763yu56go.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mD47zpI49mUSNmTPQ.name: No Blood
mD47zpI49mUSNmTPQ.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mc2iuPiBxoI7kJu8L.name: No Brain
mc2iuPiBxoI7kJu8L.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mgWXuBiYL6_U02wfd.name: No Eyes
mgWXuBiYL6_U02wfd.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mn8wU1MHZxkch-HDk.name: No Head
mn8wU1MHZxkch-HDk.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mkMiQEcPLvdkpV2I8.name: No Neck
mkMiQEcPLvdkpV2I8.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mmD7tqHv2F3jFb1n6.name: No Vitals
mmD7tqHv2F3jFb1n6.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mZ8sa8hUOYhh4OD_w.name: Unliving
mZ8sa8hUOYhh4OD_w.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
